encounter_summary: Preop H and P for deceased donor kidney transplant; ESRD due to IgA nephropathy
POD1 inpatient nephrology; tacrolimus to start POD2; good urine output
POD3 inpatient; wean IV fluids; improving creatinine
Discharge to home with education; stable graft function
Early post transplant clinic; dose adjust tacrolimus; med reconciliation
Telephone lab review; continue current plan
Clinic follow up; DSA negative; start amlodipine
Outside nephrology clinic; records not in system; encounter censored
Clinic follow up; BK and CMV PCR negative
Protocol 3 month biopsy; borderline TCMR; plan steroid pulse
Steroid pulse completed; monitor labs and BP
Six month visit; low level DSA; consider IVIG
IVIG infusion series; monitor CMV and renal function
Clinic follow up; mild BK viremia; reduce MMF
Outside urgent care visit; GI illness; encounter censored
Clinic follow up; BK PCR cleared; increase MMF
Annual visit; stable graft; preventive care
Telehealth; stable vitals and labs; shared care with local nephrology
